Name: FireBubble
Notes: A blue fire ball enemy that burns the player upon contact. It can be defeated by shooting a Star Bit at it. The second player can freeze it when touched. In SMG2, the Orange Luma can stun it when shaking nearby. It drops a single Coin when defeated. It can spawn one more Coin when defeating it after it appears again.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.
